Pictophonetic: 氏 indicates the sound; 纟 (silk) conveys the meaning.

纸条 [ zhǐ tiáo ]: slip of paper

纸张 [ zhǐ zhāng ]: paper

CONTEXT_sherlock:
报纸newspaper
高明一边吃早饭一边看那天的报纸[1]，可是他觉得很没意思，因为他很长时间没有处理[2]案 子[3]了。Gao Ming read the newspaper[1] that day while eating breakfast, but he found it very boring, because he hadn't dealt with the case[3] for a long time.
赵亮不想看报纸，他想一个人出去走走。Zhao Liang didn't want to read the newspaper, he wanted to go for a walk alone.
卷发男人慢慢地拿出了一张报纸。The curly-haired man slowly took out a newspaper.
heisig_chinese_memo: Spiderman never signs his family name on any paper for fear of people matching his signature with Peter Parker's.

chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: Spiderman doesn't have a single paper with his family name on it because he doesn't want to reveal his identity.

纸字的基本解释

纸
（紙）
zhǐ
用植物纤维制成的薄片，作为写画、印刷书报、包装等用：纸张。纸币。纸烟。纸上谈兵（喻空谈理论不解决实际问题）。洛阳纸贵（称誉别人的著作）。金迷纸醉。
量词，指书信、文件的张数：一纸空文。

纸字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhǐ］
［《廣韻》諸氏切，上紙，章。］
亦作“帋1”。“纸1”的繁体字。
(1)用丝絮或植物纤维为主要原料的制成品，可供书写、绘画、印刷、包装之用。是我国古代四大发明之一。
(2)量词。张；件。
(3)旧俗为祭奠鬼神而焚化的纸钱。
(4)旧时指印有神像的纸。

纸字的英文翻译

◎ 纸
bumf, paper

纸字的康熙字典解释

【未集中】【糸字部】　紙； 康熙笔画：10； 页码：页944第25
【廣韻】【正韻】諸氏切【集韻】【韻會】掌氏切，?音只。【說文】絮一苫也。【韻會】古人書於帛，故裁其邊幅，如絮之一苫。【釋名】紙，砥也，平滑如砥石也。【東觀漢記】黃門蔡倫造意，用樹皮及敝布魚網作紙。【初學記】古者以縑帛依書長短隨事截之，名曰幡紙，故其字从糸。至後漢，蔡倫剉故布擣抄作紙。又其字从巾。【張揖·古今字詁】巾部云：紙今帋。則其字从巾之謂也。　又姓。【魏書·官氏志】渴侯氏，後改爲紙氏。

纸字的源字形

纸字的起名意思

用于书写、印刷、绘画、包装等的东西（多用植物纤维制成）。

paper
Basic explanation of words
paper
(paper)
zhǐ
Sheets made of plant fibers are used for writing and painting, printing books and newspapers, packaging, etc.: paper. Paper money. cigarette. Talking about soldiers on paper (Yu Kong talks about theory does not solve practical problems). Luoyang Zhigui (to praise the works of others). Jin Mizhi is drunk.
The quantifier refers to the number of letters and documents: a dead letter.
paper
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zhǐ］
["Guang Yun" cut by all the clan, put on paper, chapter. ]
Also known as "帋1". Traditional characters of "纸1".
(1) Manufactured products with silk or plant fiber as the main raw material, which can be used for writing, painting, printing and packaging. It is one of the four great inventions in ancient my country.
(2) Quantifiers. Zhang; pieces.
(3) The old paper money burned to pay homage to ghosts and gods.
(4) In the old days, it refers to the paper printed with gods.

[Not concentrated] [Shizi Department] 　 paper; Kangxi strokes: 10; page number: page 944 25
【Guang Yun】【Zheng Yun】Zhu Shi cut 【Ji Yun】【Yun Hui】Zhang Shi cut, sound only. [Said the text] Xu Yiyi also. [Rhyme Club] The ancients wrote on silk, so the margins were cut to resemble a flocculent thatch. 【Release name】Paper is as smooth as a stone. [Eastern View of the Han Dynasty] Huangmen Cai Lun made the idea, using bark and cloth fish net to make paper. [Beginner's Notes] The ancients cut it off according to the length of the script, and the name is streamer paper, so its words are from Shito. In the Later Han Dynasty, Cai Lun copied the old cloth into paper. And its word from the towel. [Zhang Yi·Ancient and Modern Words] Towel Department Cloud: Paper Jinbo. The word from the towel is also.　Another last name. [Wei Shu·Guan Shi Zhi] Thi Hou Shi, later changed to Zhi Shi.
paper
Source glyph
paper
Name meaning
Things used for writing, printing, painting, packaging, etc. (Made of plant fibers).
形声字。系(乡)表意,篆书形体像丝,表示古代曾用丝帛作书写材料,而后又用旧丝棉、破布、鱼网、树皮等做纸;氏
(shi)表声。形旁简化。本义是纸张。
①纸张:~币「白~。2量词:一~空文。

zhi
紙|紙|紙1纸
隶
楷
简
Пиктофонетические символы.
Си (сян) выражает смысл, шрифт печати подобен шелку, что означает, что в древние времена шелк использовался в качестве материала для письма, а затем старый шелковый хлопок, тряпки, рыболовные сети, кора и т. Д. Использовались в качестве бумаги; Ши (ши ) выражает звук.
Упростите форму.
Первоначальное значение - бумага.
①Бумага: ~ монета "белая ~. 2 квантификатор: 1 ~ пустой текст.
